00019 #ifndef _IPL98_TYPES_H
00020 #define _IPL98_TYPES_H
00021 
00022 #include "../ipl98_setup.h" /* always include the setup file */
00023 
00024 #ifdef _IPL98_USING_CPP
00025 namespace ipl{ /* use namespace if C++ */
00026 extern "C" { /* prevent name mangling for C functions */
00027 #endif
00028 
00034 #ifndef IPL98_VERSION
00035 
00039 #define IPL98_VERSION 2.00
00040 #endif /* IPL98_VERSION */
00041  /* end group "macrodefines" */
00042 
00058 typedef enum {BMP, PGM} IMAGETYPE;
00059 
00061 typedef enum {CAMERA, DISC, RAM, EMPTY} ORIGIN;
00062 
00065 void k_GetOriginString(ORIGIN Origin,char** Name);
00066 
00068 void k_PrintOrigin(ORIGIN Origin);
00069 
00073 typedef enum {
00074         LOWCOLOR=0, HIGHCOLOR=1, UNDEFINED=2
00075 } COLORTYPE;
00076 
00079 typedef enum {
00080         FOURCONNECTED=4, EIGHTCONNECTED=8
00081 } CONNECTIVITY;
00082 
00085 typedef enum {
00086         NORTH, EAST, SOUTH, WEST, NORTHEAST, NORTHWEST, SOUTHEAST, SOUTHWEST
00087 } DIRECTION;
00088 
00090 typedef enum {
00091         CLOCKWISE, ANTICLOCKWISE
00092 } ROTATION;
00093 
00097 typedef enum {
00098         COMPLEX_REAL, COMPLEX_IMAGINARY, COMPLEX_MODULUS
00099 } COMPLEXCHOISE;
00100  /* end group "abstracts" */
00102 
00111 typedef char INT8;
00113 typedef unsigned char UINT8;
00114 
00116 typedef short int INT16;
00118 typedef unsigned short int UINT16;
00119 
00121 typedef long int INT32;
00123 typedef unsigned long int UINT32;
00124 
00126 typedef float FLOAT32;
00127  /* end group "valuetypes" */
00129 
00136 #ifndef _IPL98_USING_CPP
00137 
00138 typedef int bool;
00140 #define false 0
00141 
00142 #define true 1
00143 #endif /* _IPL98_USING_CPP */
00144  /* end group "cppcompliance" */
00146  /* end group "types" */
00148  /* end of group "Globals" */
00150
